meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Fennell Linda Shaver-Gleason Laura Kelsay Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7587.

div.div: Clip of this game shown on the 2019-04-04 episode of Better Things.

td.p: Chris Fennell, a professor from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
Linda Shaver-Gleason, a musicologist from Lompoc, California
Laura Kelsay, a hotel desk reception clerk from Grand Island, Nebraska (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,400)

tr.td: ART & ARTISTS
ALSO A BASEBALL WORD
VICKI LEAKS
REALITY TV
20th CENTURY NOVELS
WORKS LIKE A CHARM

tr.td: This artist who portrayed the Moulin Rouge in his paintings was a character in the film "Moulin Rouge!"

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
